title: Byzantine Empire
description: Venture into the continuation of the Roman Empire in the East, renowned for its art, architecture, and the preservation of classical knowledge.

title: Islamic Golden Age: Caliphates and Islamic science/culture
description: Explore the flourishing era of Islamic civilization, its scholarly pursuits, innovations, and its influence on the world.

title: Medieval Europe: Feudalism, Charlemagne, Holy Roman Empire, Crusades
description: Step into the feudal tapestry of Europe, marked by legendary monarchs, religious fervor, and the quest for power and piety.

title: Medieval Africa: Ghana, Mali, Songhai empires, Great Zimbabwe
description: Discover the great empires of Africa, their trade networks, cultural achievements, and mysterious ruins.

title: Indian Subcontinent: Maurya, Gupta, Delhi Sultanate
description: Navigate the subcontinent's rich tapestry of empires, their cultural, religious, and scientific contributions to the world.

title: East Asia: Tang, Song, Yuan, Ming dynasties
description: Experience the cultural renaissances, inventions, and dynastic shifts of East Asia, which shaped its destiny and the world.
